description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 4000 ( Name/address representation)
name: v2 Name/address representation

property.description: The date at which a concept was deprecated. Concepts that are deprecated but not inactive can still be used, but their use is discouraged

text.div:
Name/address representation

CodeDescriptionNederlands (Dutch)CommentVersion
